message: I'm captain of the Millennium Falcon.
Chewie here told me you're looking for passage to the Alderaan system.

quickReplies.text: Yes indeed. If it's a fast ship.

fast-ship.message: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?

message: It's the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
I've outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I'm talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She's fast enough for you, old man.

quickReplies.text: Only passengers. Myself, the boy, two droids - and no questions asked.

cargo.message: What is it? Some kind of local trouble?

quickReplies.text: Let's just say we like to avoid any Imperial entanglements.

message: Well that's the real trick, isn't it? And it's going to cost you something extra.

quickReplies.text: 10 thousand? We can almost buy our own ship for that.
We can pay you 2 thousand now, plus 15, when we reach Alderaan.

own-ship.message: But who's going to fly it kid? You?

quickReplies.text: You bet I could, I'm not such a bad pilot myself, we don't have to sit here and (interrupted)...
We can pay you 2 thousand now, plus 15, when we reach Alderaan.
